QuestData.Title: Burning Down the House
QuestData.Description: Look, $n!$b$bThese Alliance dogs built a camp up on the ridge.$b$bHere, take my grog. Let's make a fire they can see from Stormwind!$b$bFor the Horde!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Nazgrim's Grog to destroy the Alliance Camp atop the Scenic Overlook.
